name: Artista - Pulita 60 Aniversario - Toro
additionalNotes:
Pulita 60 Aniversario is a tribute to the company’s founder, Ramón “Pulita” Rodriguez, who started making cigars in 1956. “My grandfather loved the tobacco business, but he had a passion for cigars,” said Radhames Rodriguez, president of El Artista. The blend uses a Dominican negrito wrapper, 
Aroma off the wrapper has leather, cedar and some ginger. From the foot, the Pulita 60 Aniversario has some sweet chocolate ice cream, leather and a rancid, wet carpet-like aromas. The cold draw has a less intense ginger, chocolate ice cream, nuttiness, some white pepper and something artificial, with one sample offering a ton of black pepper.
